title: Solar Panel Self-Cleaning Mechanism
abstract: A system for automatically cleaning solar panels using electrostatic repulsion to remove dust and debris without water, enhancing efficiency in arid environments.

title: Autonomous Drone Battery Swapping Station
abstract: An automated landing pad and robotic arm system capable of swapping depleted drone batteries with fully charged ones in under 3 minutes, enabling continuous surveillance operations.

title: Biodegradable Plastic Substitute from Algae
abstract: Method for producing bioplastics using processed marine algae, resulting in a material that decomposes within 60 days in compost environments.

title: Neural Interface for Prosthetic Limb Control
abstract: A non-invasive brain-computer interface (BCI) decoding motor cortex signals to control robotic prosthetic limbs with high precision and haptic feedback.

title: Solid State Battery Electrolyte Composition
abstract: A novel ceramic-based solid electrolyte offering higher conductivity and stability for lithium-ion batteries, reducing fire risk in electric vehicles.

title: 5G Signal Booster for Dense Urban Areas
abstract: Compact beam-forming antenna array designed to improve 5G mmWave penetration in buildings and dense city infrastructure.

title: AI-Driven Crop Yield Prediction Model
abstract: Machine learning system analyzing satellite imagery and soil sensor data to predict crop yields and recommend optimal harvest times.

title: Water Purification using Graphene Oxide Membranes
abstract: High-throughput filtration system using multi-layered graphene oxide to remove heavy metals and bacteria from brackish water.

title: Foldable OLED Display Hinge Mechanism
abstract: Mechanical hinge design allowing foldable screens to close completely flat without creasing the display panel, durable for 200,000 folds.

title: Quantum Encryption Key Distribution System
abstract: Fiber-optic network hardware for distributing quantum cryptographic keys using entangled photon pairs to ensure unbreakable communication security.
